outcome: Evidence points to foreign cyber-espionage as crisis origin.

events.description: Encrypted communications intercepted by intelligence agency suggest foreign actor's involvement in BCI manipulation.
A coded map is anonymously leaked, hinting at locations of cyber-attack origins.
An emergency Council statement addresses foreign interference suspicions, vowing increased cyber defense measures.
Stenograd announces a strategic alliance with neighboring states to combat digital threats, reflecting unity and resilience.
